attributes.additional_details: Our cost of living has shot up with the increase of fuel costs on top of this years 50% price hike on gas and electricity. Our wages have stayed the same, so how can we afford this dramatic price increase? Fuel duty needs to be halfed, at least!
attributes.background: Due to the crisis in Ukraine petrol has reached £1.60 plus per litre and £1.70 a litre for diesel. Fuel duty is 57.95p per litre, with a further 20% VAT on top! We deserve a tax break until things get back to normal!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585
